<@hst.cmseditlink hippobean=item/>

${item.title}

<#if item.introduction??>

${item.introduction}

See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. --> <#-- @ftlvariable name="pageable" type="org.onehippo.cms7.essentials.components.paging.Pageable" --> <#include "../../hst:default/hst:templates/imports.ftl"> <#if pageable??>
  • ${pageable.total} document(s)
    • <#if pageable.totalPages gt 1> <#list pageable.pageNumbersArray as pageNr> <@hst.renderURL var="pageUrl"> <@hst.param name="page" value="${pageNr}"/> <@hst.param name="pageSize" value="${pageable.pageSize}"/> <#if (pageNr_index==0 && pageable.previous)> <@hst.renderURL var="pageUrlPrevious"> <@hst.param name="page" value="${pageable.previousPage}"/> <@hst.param name="pageSize" value="${pageable.pageSize}"/>
  • previous
    • <#if pageable.currentPage == pageNr>
  • ${pageNr}
    • <#else >
  • ${pageNr}
    • <#if !pageNr_has_next && pageable.next> <@hst.renderURL var="pageUrlNext"> <@hst.param name="page" value="${pageable.nextPage}"/> <@hst.param name="pageSize" value="${pageable.pageSize}"/>
  • next
hst:template

See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. --> <#-- @ftlvariable name="document" type="com.accolade.beans.ContentDocument" --> <#if document??> <@hst.link var="link" hippobean=document/>
<@hst.cmseditlink hippobean=document/>

${document.title}

<#if document.publicationDate??>

<@fmt.formatDate value=document.publicationDate.time type="both" dateStyle="medium" timeStyle="short"/>

<#if document.introduction??>

${document.introduction}

<@hst.html hippohtml=document.content/>
<#-- @ftlvariable id="editMode" type="java.lang.Boolean"--> <#elseif editMode> "> Click to edit Simple Content
hst:template

<#include "../../hst:default/hst:templates/imports.ftl"> <#-- Copyright 2014 Hippo B.V. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. --> <#-- @ftlvariable name="item" type="com.accolade.beans.Banner" --> <#-- @ftlvariable name="pageable" type="org.onehippo.cms7.essentials.components.paging.Pageable" --> <#-- @ftlvariable name="cparam" type="org.onehippo.cms7.essentials.components.info.EssentialsCarouselComponentInfo" --> <#if pageable?? && pageable.items?has_content> <#if cparam.pause> <#assign pauseCarousel = 'hover'/> <#else> <#assign pauseCarousel = ''/>
    <#list 0..(pageable.total-1) as index> <#if index==0>
  1. <#else>
<#list pageable.items as item> <#if item_index==0> <#assign active = ' active'/> <#else> <#assign active = ''/>

${item.title}

<@hst.html hippohtml=item.content/>
<#if cparam.showNavigation>
<@hst.headContribution category="htmlBodyEnd"> <@hst.headContribution category="htmlBodyEnd"> <#elseif editMode> Click to edit Carousel
